official_title: To remove a limitation on the amount of acre-feet of water annually supplied to the city of Denison, Texas, from the Lake Texoma.

summary.text: Repeals the ceiling on the amount of water the Chief of Engineers may provide to Denison, Texas, from Lake Texoma.
